summary: This document contains certifications from the Office of the Lieutenant Governor of the Virgin Islands regarding the existence and good standing of two companies: Southern Financial, LLC and Southern Trust Company, Inc. It confirms their incorporation details and compliance with local laws.

persons.name: Gregory R. Francis
persons.context: Gregory R. Francis certifies the existence of Southern Financial, LLC and provides a certification of good standing for Southern Trust Company, Inc.

persons.name: Denise Johannes
persons.role: Director, Division of Corporations and Trademarks
persons.context: Denise Johannes certifies that Southern Trust Company, Inc. is in good standing.

events.title: Filing of Articles of Organization
events.description: Southern Financial, LLC filed Articles of Organization with the Office of the Lieutenant Governor.

events.title: Filing of Articles of Incorporation
events.description: Southern Trust Company, Inc. filed Articles of Incorporation with the Office of the Lieutenant Governor.

events.title: Issuance of Certificate of Incorporation
events.description: A Certificate of Incorporation was issued to Southern Trust Company, Inc. authorizing it to conduct business in the Virgin Islands.

keyFacts: Southern Financial, LLC was organized on February 25, 2013.
Southern Trust Company, Inc. was formerly known as Financial Informatics, Inc.
Southern Trust Company, Inc. filed Articles of Incorporation on November 18, 2011.
A Certificate of Incorporation for Southern Trust Company, Inc. was issued on December 8, 2011.
Both companies are in good standing with the Office of the Lieutenant Governor.
